statement: "Six justices" on the U.S. Supreme Court have been "confirmed in presidential election years since 1912."

statement: "Arizona schools rank 45th in the nation, dead last in funding per student."

statement: "We were able to provide $428 million worth of property tax relief."

statement: "Republicans control the U.S. Senate with 54 seats, but those 54 senators were elected by only two-thirds the number of voters who elected the Democrats. In the Senate, the majority party represents a minority of the people."

statement: Under the Iran nuclear deal, "we give them $150 billion, we get nothing."

statement: Illegal "immigration is lower than it’s been in 40 years."

statement: "You know what Truman said, ‘You want a friend in Washington, buy a dog.’ "

statement: "The fact is voter fraud is rampant."

statement: "Six justices" on the U.S. Supreme Court have been "confirmed in presidential election years since 1912."

"I opposed TPP (Trans-Pacific Partnership) and have always opposed TPP."

statement: "Now we have ISIS coming over the (U.S.-Mexico) border."
